metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, and manage post tags for categorization and filtering

steps.expected: Post editor page loads with Tags section visible
steps.actual: Post editor page loaded successfully with Edit Post Details panel showing Tags input field

steps.action: Enter tags 'technology, testing, publisher' in Tags input field
steps.expected: Tags text is entered in the input field

steps.action: Press comma/Enter to convert tags to chips
steps.expected: Tags are converted to removable tag chips
steps.actual: Tags were successfully converted to blue chips with X buttons: 'technology', 'testing', 'publisher'

steps.action: With existing tags displayed, click the X button on 'testing' tag chip
steps.expected: The 'testing' tag is removed from the list
steps.actual: The 'testing' tag was successfully removed, leaving only 'technology' and 'publisher' tags

steps.action: Enter a new tag 'newtesttag2026' that doesn't exist in the system
steps.actual: New tag text was entered successfully

steps.action: Press comma to create the new tag
steps.expected: New tag is created and displayed as a chip
steps.actual: New tag 'newtesttag2026' was successfully created and displayed as a removable chip

steps.action: Enter a very long tag exceeding 50 characters: 'ThisIsAVeryLongTagNameThatExceedsNormalLengthLimitsToTestIfTheSystemHandlesLongTags...'
steps.expected: System enforces character limit or truncates tag
steps.actual: System displayed warning 'A tag cannot be more than 50 characters long' and truncated the tag to exactly 50 characters: 'ThisIsAVeryLongTagNameThatExceedsNormalLengthLimit'

steps.action: With 'testtag' already added as a tag chip, attempt to add 'testtag' again
steps.expected: System prevents duplicate tag from being added
steps.actual: System prevented duplicate by not converting the text to a chip and highlighting the duplicate text in red/pink background as visual feedback

steps.expected: Tag with special characters is either accepted or handled appropriately
steps.actual: Tag 'test@special#tag$123' was successfully created - characters @, #, $ are accepted
System stripped the HTML-like characters '<test>' for XSS prevention, creating tag 'tag&amp' instead. This demonstrates proper security handling.

observations: Auto-suggest existing tags: Code in TagsFilterManager.js shows tag filtering capability exists, but no auto-suggest dropdown appeared when typing partial tag names in the Tags input field. The tagsInput binding uses basic text input without autocomplete. This feature may not be implemented in the current UI.

View tag cloud: The TagsFilter module (TagsFilterManager.js) exists and provides GetTopTags API functionality, but this module is not added to the News page. Only 'Authors' filter is visible on the page sidebar. The tag cloud feature would need the TagsFilter module to be added to the page to be testable.
Bulk tag operations: No UI element found for bulk tag operations. Tags can only be added/removed one at a time through the post editor interface.
Tags are stored using DNN's taxonomy system via PostManager.cs UpdatePostTags method which uses TermController.
Tag input accepts comma-separated values and converts them to removable tag chips on comma press or blur.
